jobs_results.title: Senior Security Analyst
jobs_results.description:
There is now an exciting opportunity for an experienced individual to join our new team as Senior Security Analyst.

Principle duties
• Lead implementation and operation of proactive security operation measures such as vulnerability scanning and penetration testing and generate reports highlighting findings.
• Establish, maintain and enforce policy, guidelines and baselines related to security for the users and administration of IT systems.
• Review existing and proposed system configurations and designs to ensure compliance with security controls and baselines.
• Lead IT system risk assessments for IT systems and scenarios and evaluate proposed system changes.
• Design, implement, operate and maintain security tools and solutions such as network security appliances, end point protection, perimeter protection tools with minimal supervision and guidance.
• Monitor IT systems for security threats and participate in response planning and remediation actions.
• Perform other miscellaneous... duties as directed by the Manager.

Requirements
• Bachelor's degree or Associate degree with 3 additional years of experience in the IT field.
• 9 years’ experience in IT field.
• CISSP or equivalent professional certification is preferred.
• Proficient in written and oral English.
• At least 5 years work experience at information security service company or department (At least 2 years work experience at security service providing job and 2 years work experience at internal security management job).
• Script (perl, awk, sed, windows scripting host, sh) design and creation skill.
• Design a security control process, procedure and operation and document it.
• Both windows and Unix/Linux operating system implementation and administration skill.

How to apply

If you believe you meet the requirements for this role, please contact us with your CV stating your experience as well as current & expected salary

jobs_results.title: Research Fellow (Civil/Environmental Engineering)
jobs_results.description:
Job Description :

SJ-NTU Corporate Lab invites application for the position of Research
Fellow.
Job Description
• Responsible for developing an integrated 1D/2D urban catchment
hydrologic and hydraulic model that can seamlessly simulate runoff,
drainage network, and water quality processes for design storms or
continuous time series data in identified study sites throughout
Southeast Asia
• Adapt the catchment model to interface a 3D coastal hydraulics model
to simulate compound flooding conditions
• Develop an urban resiliency scorecard, based on principles of
ecosystem services, to be included within the decision support system

Job Requirements
• Possess Ph.D. in Civil or Environmental Engineering or related field
• Experience with hydrologic, hydraulic, and water quality urban
watershed model application
• Competence with ArcGIS and R statistical software packages
• Experience with management of big data sets
• Experience with in situ environmental monitoring systems
• Experience... in conducting Ecosystem Services evaluations

We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.Hiring
Institution: NTU

jobs_results.title: Senior / System Analyst (b2b/edi & Sharepoint Administration)
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Job Summary :

Responsible for all EDI integration work with different customer and vendors and provide EDI design, development and deployment across the different systems. Perform daily support and trouble-shooting on EDI/B2B issues for local & regional operations.

Responsibilities :
• Responsible for all EDI and B2B-BizTalk design, development, enhancement and deployment.
• Perform EDI support, trouble-shooting and debugging.
• Coordinate and lead all EDI development. Changes with external vendors and customers.
• Perform SAP EDI / B2B – BizTalk support and development changes.
• Perform necessary Microsoft BizTalk upgrade & patches as and when required.

Requirements :
• Degree / Diploma in Computer Science, Information Systems.
• Minimum 3-5 years’ relevant experience.
• Experience working with SharePoint is required.
• Familiar with XSLT transform / EDI-X12/EDIFACT schemas / SAP IDOC structure.
• Experience in Microsoft Biztalk server 2010/2016 and XML coding and processing.
•... Experience in EDI / ALE design, development and deployment between any middleware and B2B services/applications.
• Experience working with EDI / ALE and work flow and any middleware and B2B applications will be an advantage.
• Experience in system integrations using Microsoft related products and Microsoft Dynamics application will be an advantage.
• Demonstrates specific knowledge of the function and makeup of Microsoft SharePoint.
• Professional Microsoft/SAP/Oracle certification will be an advantage.
• Possesses ability to think creatively to devise customizations and uses for SharePoint.
• Demonstrates ability to work and conduct research independently.
• Demonstrates strong leadership skills and team player.
• Excellent communication skill.
• Manages time efficiently and multi-tasks effectively.
• Possesses strong problem-solving and analytical skills

jobs_results.title: E-Commerce Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Principal Responsibilities:
• Uses an understanding of the existing system architecture to identify the addition of or changes to system interfaces, functional system behavior, and data requirements.
• Develops and analyzes system functional requirements.
• Facilitates cross-functional team meetings to address business problems or systems issues.
• Documents business requirements and systems specifications.
• Interprets business needs and translates them into system requirements. Reviews with the development group for system design and development.
• Engage, analyze, develop, test and maintain for our B2B systems (EDI/RosettaNet) with external partners as well as in-house business users and IT teams
• Clarify business network integration requirements, map them to systems capabilities, and recommend technical solutions.
• Develop and maintain technical messaging specifications and other relevant documentation
• Prepare appropriate testing and implementation documentation
• Provide 2nd... level application support and maintenance for B2B systems as needed
• Be the communication interface among external partners as well as in-house users/IT team

Job Level Specifications:
• Foundational knowledge of specialized disciplines, industry practices and standards, acquired via academic instruction and/or relevant work experience of substantially the same level.
• Develops solutions to defined tasks, typical assignments and projects. May be solved by the application of specialized foundational knowledge, using existing approaches and solutions.
• Work is usually performed independently and requires the exercise of judgment and discretion. Receives initial direction although work may be reviewed for accuracy and quality.
• Collaborates with immediate management and team members within the department or function.
• Actions typically affect own work assignments and department. Erroneous decisions or failure to accomplish work may require some assistance or resources to remedy.

Work Experience:
• Ideal with 2-4 years experience in B2B/EDI implementation and support
• Familiarity with B2B technologies is a plus, e.g., EDIFACT, ANSI X12, RosettaNet, Flat File, XML, etc; as well as B2B/EDI platform on webMethods and AI
• Good understanding in SDLC

Education and Certification(s):
• Bachelor's degree/Diploma or equivalent experience from which comparable knowledge and job skills can be obtained.

Distinguishing Characteristics:
• Executes assigned tasks to satisfactory level of completion and accuracy. Knowledge gained can be leveraged to independently define tasks and next steps.

The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills

jobs_results.title: Senior IT Analyst
jobs_results.description: Job Summary Looking for an exciting opportunity? We are looking for a experienced .NET professionals to be involved in open innovations prototyping, proof of concepts and content discovery projects for our client. Mandatory Skill-set Degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineering and / or Computer Science; At least 5 years' experience in application development, operational support and maintenance; Experience with container technology like Docker, Docker Swarm or Kubernetes; Must have experience and certification in AWS; Technical experience in C# .NET, PHP, PERL, or C++ and front-end technologies like HTML5, jQuery, JavaScript and CSS; Exposure to with front-end framework like Angular, AngularJS, REACT; Hands-on in optimized SQL queries or stored procedures; Working experience in Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and having integrating application using SOAP or REST services; Ability to communicate and present technical information in a clear and unambiguous manner; Strong... ability to work independently and cooperate with diverse teams in a multiple stakeholders environment. Desired Skill-set Microsoft Azure Certification; Google Cloud Certification. Responsibilities Responsible for all systems enhancements, support and overall availability of the systems; Ensure that all production emergencies, issues are resolved in a timely manner based on SLA; Perform routine checks and escalate to management of any anomaly detected and take initiative to troubleshoot together with various teams and vendors; Ensure follow through on every issue / problem till closure; and complete the necessary documentation as required; Assist users and answer queries regarding the supported operational systems; Ensure necessary changes / enhancements are implemented and documented as per corporate standards and guidelines; Develop new applications and maintenance of any existing systems assigned; Ensure projects timeline and resources are tracked. Should you be interested in this career opportunity, please send in your updated resume to applysciente.com at the earliest. When you apply, you voluntarily consent to the disclosure, collection and use of your personal data for employment/recruitment and related purposes in accordance with the SCIENTE Group Privacy Policy, a copy of which is published at SCIENTE's website ( https://www.sciente.com/privacy-policy ). We are looking for a experienced .NET professionals to be involved in open innovations prototyping, proof of concepts and content discovery projects for our client. Skills: Dotnet, .NET, Asp.net, C#, Asp Dotnet, Aws, Amazon Web Service, Soap, Ajax, Javascript, Html5, Css, Soa, Service Oriented Architecture, .NET Framework, Dot Net Framework, Sql, Sql Development, Database Design Sql, Json Experience: 5.00-10.00 Years Education: Bachelors/ Degree

jobs_results.title: L1 L2 Application Support
jobs_results.company_name: Crédit Agricole Corporate and Investment Bank
jobs_results.description:
Capital Market IT Run Specialist
Who we are
Crédit Agricole Corporate and Investment Banking (CA-CIB) is the CIB arm of Crédit Agricole Group, world’s 11th largest bank by total assets.
Our Singapore center is one of the 3 main IT Hubs for CA-CIB's worldwide business. We work daily with international branches located in 33 countries by:
- Envisioning and preparing the Bank’s futures information systems
- Partnering and supporting core banking flagships and transverse areas in their large scale development projects.
- Providing premium In-house Banking applications,

This unique positioning empowers us to bring our core banking business a sustainable competitive advantage on the market.
We seek innovative and agile people sharing our mindset to support ambitious and forthcoming technological challenges.

The Department and position

The department is responsible for development and maintenance of Capital Market applications used by worldwide users.
Run the bank is the first mission of... IT department. It involves many front line IT professionals who understand the nature of business operations, timing of activities & data flowing through internal and external systems.They are continuously working with business users, infrastructure engineer and system managers.
The candidate will join the Singapore Capital Market Run the bank team in charge of running application for capital market from Front-Office (Murex, Apex, Orchestrade…), Back-Office (Summit, Calypso…) and Market data referential (Asset Control..), Market Risk applications (in-house application on big data technologies).
It is a great first position to onboard in a IT banking domain, with many fundamental learning of what is the Information System of an investment bank. It provide step by step learning, starting from Level 1 support, then moving to level 2 and finally being part of the continuous improvement ande evolution of new application and process optimization.

Main responsibilities

Application monitoring responsibilities
• Define and implement in coordination with the build team the needed application monitoring
• Supervise and monitor daily and monthly chains and handle user request by working closely with project, infrastructure and production teams
• Support overnight batches which take place during the Singapore Morning and early afternoon time to ensure that problems are swiftly analyzed and resolved to minimize down-time.
• Process and issue daily, weekly and monthly reporting on data quality of risk chain in which the activity is usually more intense on monthly run.

Incidents and Requests management (business users and others IT teams)
• Provide level 1 and level 2 application support to the business users (trader, risk manager, market risk monitoring operator, back-office and middle-office analyst, market data administrator,…)
• Analyze and manage incidents/problems/requests coming

Problem management and continuous improvement
• Prepare and maintain knowledge base for each of the application in the scope of the team in coordination with the build team and the ops team
• Collaborate with build team to assess the priority of the problem and follow-up the resolution, even contributing to the definition of long term solution.
• Provide non-functional requirement to the build team to implement monitoring as code whenever available.
• The Support analyst should have a pro-active mindset in security, incident preventive measures, productivity and global improvement of the quality of service. Candidate should have a strong appetite in the capital market functional business.

Qualifications and Profile
• Candidates should have 3+ years experience in support activity.
• Candidates should have ITIL certification or willing to take study for it.
• Strong knowledge in XML, SQL, PL/SQL, MQ Series, CFT and Control-M.
• Knowledge of monitoring solution (E.g ITRS Geneos)
• Strong analytical or troubleshooting skills

Optional
• General banking and finance understanding and knowledge
• Understanding of trade life cycle, financial products (Treasury, FX, Bonds, Credit, IRD…)
• Exposure to Capital Market FO/BO system (E.g. Summit, Kondor+, Murex…)
• Experience in reconciliation system like Intellimatch

Education & Work Experience:
• Junior level (1-2 years experience)
Shift Timings:
Person will have to work in shifts as support is requiring 24/6 Support.
(00:00~9:00) (7:00 ~16:00) (15:00 ~1:00next day

jobs_results.title: Team Lead \u002f Business System Analyst \u002f Lead (j2ee)
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities
• The Business System Analyst is responsible to gather, analyse and formalise user’s business requirements and processes . Lead technically for overall project implementation .
• To provide application architecture design to system implemented on JavaEE environment. Gather, analyse and formalise user’s business requirements and processes, evaluate on feasibility of implementation and manage scope of project.
• Develop technical design specification and translate technical design into process/program specification. Involve in the design review session.
• Assist in Prepare project documentation such as Requirement Specifications/Use Case Specifications etc Adhere to project scope, update requirement traceability matrix, inform and record out-of-scope issues
• To review detail technical design provided by deliveryf team.
• To provide technical guidance to delivery team.
• To perform code review and address coding issue affecting system performance and security..
• To... provide support in system performance testing by identifying system performance bottleneck and providing performance tuning advise
• To provide analysis and resolution of production system reliability and performance issue
• To front customer technical engagement in technical review meetings, project management committee and project steering committee
• Make changes to configurable items, which include hardware, software, documentation, etc.
• Participate in Coding and Code Review. Assist in the integration testing, system testing, User Acceptance Test & implementation activities.
• Provide post implementation support (including production support and service requests).

Requirements
• Above 7-10 years’ experience in working with Java J2EE .
• Min 4 Years of experience as Technical lead for complex web & web mobile applications.
• In-depth experience with MVC architecture, J2EE, Java, Webservices,RESTFul services,
• Strong software development skills, good understanding of object oriented concepts & design patterns.
• Self-motivated with an ability to work in cross platform technologies and to work on more than one project at a time.
• Hands on experience in Angular 4/6, JQuery,JSON.
• In-depth Experience with MySQL, MariaDB and Oracle databases.
• In depth on Experience with Unix, Linux.
• Good Experience MySQL, Maria DB ,Oracle databases. Ability to handle/Guide team on SQL tuning.
• Certified in Java,J2EE.
• Hands on Experience of project initialization, execution with key emphasis on Analysis, Architecture Design and Testing of the application.
• Should be able to propose the solution for new project requirement, and able to present the solution to business users and end customers.
• Able to do in-depth analysis and document the system requirements .
• Extensive working experience in analysing requirements and executing projects related to JAVA/J2EE Technology.
• Strong team player with excellent inter-personal skills.
• Ability to meet deadlines with no compromise on the quality of the work product.

Candidates will be offered a Permanent / Direct Contract role, based on assessment

jobs_results.title: Senior IS Analyst / IS Analyst (2-year), IITS
jobs_results.description:
This position is for

Office of Integrated Information Technology Services (IITS). Gather, analyse and translate business requirements to system specifications. Configure, administer and maintain enterprise applications supporting the University’s key domain areas of Research and Library Management. Manage project / maintenance plan, schedule, budget, resources, stakeholders, vendors and outsourcing contracts. Value-add by providing advice on best practices in using appropriate technology, reviewing and improving work processes, facilitating and supporting users' change management process and influencing alignment of changes with the overall organisation goals. Prepare test plans, lead and coordinate user-acceptance testing. Deliver project and system documentation according to the Project Development Methodology. Form good user relations by cultivating trust and building good rapport with users. Conduct post implementation reviews to gather users' feedback and plan for enhancements... Monitor new technologies / releases / patches and make recommendations. Ensure high quality of deliverables, and assist to review and QC team members' deliverables.

Qualifications

Degree / Diploma in Computer Science, IT or related discipline. Minimum 3 to 5 years of relevant work experience, preferably with hands-on experience as a business / functional analyst. Good experience in business requirements gathering and analysis. Prior IT experience in institutions of higher learning (in particular research management / administration) and SaaS application delivery (administering the setup and configuration) will be an added advantage. Certification in Business Analysis and / or Project Management (e.g. PMP, CITPM) will be useful. Good knowledge of software development life cycles and structured project development methodology. Excellent communication (oral and written), interpersonal, conflict management, negotiation, analytical and problem solving skills. Proactive self-starter who is result-driven and a team player.

Other Information

Candidates who do not possess the stipulated qualifications but have relevant work experience may still apply. Remuneration and appointment terms shall commensurate with qualifications and experience. SMU reserves the right to modify the appointment terms where necessary

jobs_results.title: Senior Analyst (Application Support)
jobs_results.description:
Job no: 496773
Work type: Full Time
Location: HarborFront Office
Categories: Information Technology

JOB SCOPE
• Provide level 2 application support, minor projects and request fulfilment
• Field incoming incident tickets from end users to resolve application and software issues
• Provide incident resolution management and root cause analysis techniques to determine cause and resolve complex system issues.
• Communicate application problems and issues to key stakeholders, including management, development teams, end users, and unit leaders.
• Test fixes and perform post-resolution follow-ups to ensure problems have been adequately resolved.
• Document all pertinent end user identification information, including name, department, contact information, and nature of problem or issue.
• Prioritize, schedule, and administer all instances where enhancements and defect resolution are required.
• Record, track, and document the incident-solving process, including all successful and... unsuccessful decisions made, and actions taken, through to final resolution.
• Post software updates, knowledge bases, and frequently asked questions resources on company intranet to assist in problem resolution.
• Perform preventative maintenance, including the installation of service packs, patches, hot fixes, and so on.
• Identify and learn appropriate software applications used and supported by the organization.

JOB REQUIREMENTS
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent the field of computer science, information systems, or equivalent.
• .Net/Java knowledge are essential. MS-SQL knowledge will also be preferred.
• 5 years work experience in application support or equivalent using problem resolution and root cause analysis techniques. In depth knowledge of Wintel application and troubleshooting methods.
• Software development/ programming skills in ASP.NET, VB.NET, VB6, Javascript, HTML5, Json, Batch scripting, XML, .NET Framework 3.5 and above, Java, Crystal Reports.
• Experience with setup, managing and troubleshooting IIS web services and Windows services is a MUST.
• Strong analytical and problem solving skills, and experience applying these skills to resolve issues.
• Able to analyse the requirements and propose the suitable solution for the business needs.
• Experience with troubleshooting principles, methodologies, and issue resolution techniques.
• Experience with software installation, build, continuous integration and source control tools.
• Experience with Microsoft Windows/Web environment development is an added advantage.
• Knowledge of more advanced programming environments and concepts (e.g. Multi-Threading, OS internals, Networking) is an added advantage.
• Able to function effectively in a fast paced environment, handle multiple tasks simultaneously, and able to prioritize effectively in order to meet deadlines.
• Ability to work both independently and as a team member under general supervision and direction.
• Good written and verbal communication skills.
• Able to work under pressure and out of office hour during critical incident/application recovery activity.
• Experience with mobility related technologies, multi-platform development is a plus.
• Experience in Application System Support or Coding with UAT support experience within an Enterprise System environment with understanding of Change Control & Access Control.
• Experience in creating Web Application in C# using MS SQL Reporting Service (SSRS) on IIS 6.0 or IIS 7.0
• Experience in setup of Web System using MS SQL Server & MS SQL Reporting Service & SQL Server Integration Services.
• Able to be Hands-on for Software configuration for MS SQL Reporting Service, SQL Server Integration Services, IIS Configuration setup and Packaged Software Configuration.
• Constructing and fine-tuning SQL queries to improve performance is a bonus point.
• Working knowledge Microsoft Windows System Environment.
• Basic understanding of System Authentication Framework between servers within Microsoft Windows System Environment
• Working experience with TFS is a plus
• ITIL certified is a MUST

You agree that it is a condition of employment that you adhere to and abide by all rules, regulations, policies and procedures including without limitation the rules of conduct of the Company.

Advertised: 16 Apr 2021 Singapore Standard Time
Applications close

jobs_results.title: Pega System Analyst
jobs_results.description:
• Design banking applications using Pega platform and delivering high-quality applications.
• Responsible and perform end-to-end development for Pega based applications.
• Work closely with key stakeholders to deliver projects and solutions.
• Provide support to SIT and UAT, investigate and resolve technical issues reported in projects.
• Conduct system and performance management, application vulnerability management and control, software release management.
• Plan and commission production system implementation.
• Develop and review technical documents and other System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) related documents.
• Provide thought leadership within own area of responsibility.
• Integrates applications by interface specification and designing database architecture and server scripting.
• Able to work independently and be self-motivated
Qualifications
• Minimum PCSA (Pega Certified System Architect) in Pega 7.4 and above, preferably Pega CSSA (certified Senior System Architect). A... Pega CLSA (Certified Lead System Architect) will be advantage.
• Possess working experience in Pega 7 or above with min. 3-4 years working experience in banking applications development
• Preferably with Information Technology / Engineering /Computer Science related degree.
• Strong technical knowledge and development experience in object-oriented languages like Java.
• Strong competency in design OO pattern and enterprise integration patterns
• Relevant experience in Java, Spring, or J2EE technologies and Angular JS
• Possess development experience in ASP or Web/REST API, JavaScript, jQuery, and CSS.
• Strong technical knowledge on database systems such as SQL Server, Oracle, RDBMS design and optimization.
• Experience with Messaging, Python, NoSQL DB (MongoDB) is a plus.
• Experience in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and AGILE methodology.
• Self-motivated and possess drive, and ability to work independently and a good team player.
• Strong analytical, communications and interpersonal skills as well as able proficient in English language both spoken and written.
• Passion to learn new technology and deliver high quality deliverables in first go
• Design banking applications using Pega platform and delivering high-quality applications. * Responsible and perform end-to-end development for Pega based applications. * Work closely with key stakeholders to deliver projects and solutions.

Skills: Pega System Analyst

Experience: 3.00-4.00 Years
